title: Flights: Man condemned for ‘lowest of the low’ deed in airport - should he be arrested?
text:
The shocking moment was caught on film by another traveller, who shared it with Instagram account @PassengerShaming.

In the video, the man can be seen sitting in a waiting area alongside other passengers.

At first, nothing seems out of the ordinary, and the man doesn’t stand out from any other person waiting for their plane to board.

However, he soon turns a few heads when he apparently begins to urinate directly onto the tiled airport floor.

READ MORE: FCO travel warning: Australia fires trap 4,000 people on beaches [TRAVEL WARNING]
tags: FCO travel warning: Australia fires trap 4,000 people on beaches
meta_description: TRAVELLING with fellow passengers can bring about all kinds of unlikely scenarios. Travellers in an airport were shocked when they spotted a traveller doing this dirty deed, dubbing him “the lowest of the low.” Should he be arrested?
